column1: # Event shown immediately on startup, for the admin

column2: (ED:MP) Auto Refill Levies

Due to issues with CK2 saves (see below for details), characters' levies may be significantly depleted on game load for no good reason. This is particularly noticeable and penalising in multiplayer.\nDETAILS: Some modifiers which affect max levy size are NOT stored in the save game file. So, on load, max levies are artificially low. This is recalc'd about 1 month later, but the quantity of available levies is NOT restored. IE: Affected characters require many years to refill their levies, for no good reason.\nWORKAROUND: Refill levies 1.5 months after session start.

column2: (ED:MP) Auto Refill Levies

As described in the startup event, this event allows you to manually refill all characters'/players' levies, as a workaround for an issue with max levies in saved games.\nNB1: If a character has raised their levies (eg. war, raiding), then refilling them may give them an unfair advantage.
